item.description:
OUR ANNUAL

http://www.worldfellowship.org/   CHECK THE SITE!!!

MEOMORIAL WEEKEND GET AWAY.

IN A WORLD FELLOWSHIP CENTER , NH.

HELP CENTER GET READY FOR THE SEASON. WORK ON VARIOUS AREAS: GARDENING, FARMING, HOUSE CLEANING AND CARPENTRY!! FOOD, BED PROVIDED, NICE COMPANY GARANTEED! RECONNECT WITH NATURE, AUTHENTIC YOU, MAKE NEW FRIENDS, GET NEW IDEAS...

 

“ITS GREAT! NATURE, FRIENDS, GOOD FOOD, PHYSICAL WORK, INTELLECTUAL STIMULATION...”

ITS WAS GREAT LAST YEAR!!

VERY INTIMATE, HELP OPENNING THE SEASON AT A WONDERFUL, UNIQUE CAMP, GET TO KNOW SOME STAFF MEMBERS, WORK TOGETHER ON A FARM, CONSTRACTION, GARDENING, OR HOUSE PREPS...FOOD IS ABSOLUTELY OUTSTANDING!

SWIM IN A LAKE..WALK/HIKE/BIKE AROUND...READ, PLAY GAMES, MUSIC...DISCUSS/DEBATE....EVERYTHING YOU NEED TO FEEL ALIVE AND WORTHY...

DIRECTORS OF THE CAMP, ANDY AND ANDREA ARE MORE THEN WELCOMING YOU TO JOIN THIS SPECIAL WORK FOR STAY AND PLAY. THEY ARE ASKING FROM YOU 4 HRS/A DAY OF VOLUNTEER, IN RETURN YOU GET A RUSTIC LODGING, AND MEALS. AND ALL THAT CENTER OFFERS PRESEASON...PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN LINENS/SLIPPING GEAR, BUG REPPELANT, SUN SCREEN, WATER BOTTLE, WORKING WEAR, GLOVES, WORKING SHOES, HAT, AND NICE YOURSELF.

STAY AS MUCH AS YOU CAN/WANT. A MEMORIAL WEEKEND, OR DAY/TWO,

MY CELL 781-718-6203 MAIA

CENTER PERSON AT THE CAMP WILL BE NORMA WASSEL, 617-997-6495,  

normawassel@yahoo.com    ACTIVE MEMBER, AND BOARD DIRECTOR.   DIRECTONS TO THE CENTER:  The address of Uphaus Lodge, where nearly everyone will stay, is 448 Drake Hill Rd. Follow the directions on our website, turn right onto Drake Hill Road at our sign, proceed about 3/4 of a mile, and Uphaus Lodge will be on your left, just after a yellow house. We'll have supper waiting at 6pm on Friday, but come earlier or later as you are able.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: World Fellowship Center, NH on memorial weekend
